name: Wiggle Ship
description:
**Disclaimer, make sure to run the game in landscape mode on your phone**

Wiggle Ship is a light hearted endless flyer in which you fly an S1 Spartan Class Fighter Jet, through an onslaught of killer turbines, rockets, and barriers. In this initial installment of the game mastering the timing and flight mechanics, is key to setting the  highest time for your run. Compete against yourself or friends in this fun addictive hyper casual game.
